mapper.select: select A.service_no as "no" , A.service_symptom as "symptom" , A.service_reservation as "reservation" , A.user_no as "user.no" , U.user_name as "user.name" , U.user_phone as "user.phone" , U.user_address as "user.address" , A.employee_no as "employee.no" , E.employee_name as "employee.name" , A.center_id as "center.id" , C.center_name as "center.name" , A.division_id as "division.id" , D.division_name as "division.name" , A.service_id as "serviceStatus.id" , S.service_status as "serviceStatus.status" , A.type_id as "serviceType.id" , T.type_name as "serviceType.name" , A.service_address as "address" from sc_afterservice A, service_status S, service_type T, sc_user U, sc_division D, sc_employee E, sc_center C where A.service_no = #{value} AND A.service_id = S.service_id AND A.type_id = T.type_id AND A.user_no = U.user_no AND A.division_id = D.division_id AND A.employee_no = E.employee_no AND A.center_id = C.center_id

select count(*) from sc_afterservice A, service_status S, service_type T, sc_user U, sc_employee E, sc_center C where A.service_id = S.service_id AND A.type_id = T.type_id AND A.user_no = U.user_no AND A.employee_no = E.employee_no AND A.center_id = C.center_id AND U.user_no = #{userNo}

select J.service_no as "no" , J.service_symptom as "symptom" , J.service_reservation as "reservation" , J.user_no as "user.no" , J.user_name as "user.name" , J.user_phone as "user.phone" , J.user_address as "user.address" , J.employee_no as "employee.no" , J.employee_name as "employee.name" , J.center_id as "center.id" , J.center_name as "center.name" , J.service_id as "serviceStatus.id" , J.service_status as "serviceStatus.status" , J.type_id as "serviceType.id" , J.type_name as "serviceType.name" from (select row_number() over (order by A.service_no desc) rn, A.service_no , A.service_symptom , A.service_reservation , A.user_no , U.user_name , U.user_phone , U.user_address , A.employee_no , E.employee_name , A.center_id , C.center_name , A.service_id , S.service_status , A.type_id , T.type_name from sc_afterservice A, service_status S, service_type T, sc_user U, sc_employee E, sc_center C where A.service_id = S.service_id AND A.type_id = T.type_id AND A.user_no = U.user_no AND A.employee_no = E.employee_no AND A.center_id = C.center_id AND U.user_no = #{userNo}) J where rn >= #{beginIndex} and rn <= #{endIndex}
mapper.insert: insert into sc_afterservice (service_no, service_symptom, service_reservation, user_no, employee_no, center_id, division_id, service_id, type_id, service_address) values (#{no}, #{symptom}, #{reservation}, #{user.no}, #{employee.no}, #{center.id}, #{division.id}, #{serviceStatus.id}, #{serviceType.id}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
